about.title: Amal Al-Qata Trading Company
about.subtitle: About Us
about.description: Amal Al-Qata Trading Company is a Saudi company specialized in spare parts trade, serving the vehicle, trailer, and petroleum product packaging system sectors. It focuses on providing reliable products with high quality and competitive prices, supported by extensive experience and an effective supply chain.

support.title: Technical Support
support.description: The technical support team is available to help you with:

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Common Questions

items.question: How can I order spare parts?
items.answer: You can order spare parts in several ways: contact via phone or WhatsApp, send an email, fill out the contact form on the website, or visit our main headquarters in Riyadh.

items.question: What is the delivery time?
items.answer: Delivery time varies depending on location and product. In major cities (24-48 hours), in other areas (3-5 working days). For custom order products (7-14 working days).

items.question: Do you offer warranty on products?
items.answer: Yes, all our products come with a warranty ranging from 6 months to one year depending on the product type. Warranty details are mentioned in the purchase invoice.

items.question: How can I ensure product quality?
items.answer: All our products undergo quality control and safety standards. You can request free samples or visit our showroom to see product quality. We also hold ISO 9001:2015 quality certification.

faq.cta: Didn't find an answer to your question?

servicesPage.title: Our Services
servicesPage.subtitle: Integrated solutions to ensure your business continuity
servicesPage.description: At A'mal Al-Qita' for Trading, we don't just provide spare parts. We offer integrated services designed to meet your operational needs and achieve the highest levels of satisfaction and efficiency. We strive to provide an exceptional experience that starts from the order and ends with after-sales service and ongoing technical support.

Support in choosing the right part

products.note: Providing automotive spare parts from the best international suppliers

specializedServices.title: Our Specialized Services
specializedServices.intro: Solutions specifically designed to meet our customers' needs

services.title: Import on Demand
services.description: We provide the possibility to import parts not available locally according to customer requests, in cooperation with a wide network of trusted global suppliers, ensuring quality and timely delivery.

subService.title: Local & International Delivery
subService.description: We offer fast and secure delivery services within the Kingdom and abroad, for both individual customers and companies/institutions, through our partners in the field.

services.title: Petroleum Filling System Installation & Inspection
services.description: Providing installation, inspection, and maintenance services for petroleum tank filling and unloading systems, including pipes, valves, and connections. We work according to the highest industrial safety standards to ensure proper and safe operation in fuel facilities and distribution centers.

services.title: Truck Inspection & Programming
services.description: We provide accurate electronic inspection and programming services for truck systems using advanced diagnostic devices covering sensor systems, engine systems, and more. This helps in early fault detection and improves overall vehicle performance.

services.title: Brake System Maintenance & Repair
services.description: We provide professional maintenance and repair services for brake calipers and air blowers used in trucks and trailers. Using specialized tools and original parts, we ensure the system returns to its full performance with accurate inspection and workmanship warranty.

services.title: Custom Astather Platform Beams Design
services.description: We offer design and custom fabrication services for Astather platform beams with the highest quality, with the possibility of printing the customer's name or company logo on the beam. A professional service that reflects your company's identity and enhances the appearance of your fleet on the road.

targetSectors.title: Sectors We Serve
targetSectors.subtitle: We meet the needs of multiple sectors with reliable and highly efficient solutions
targetSectors.description: We serve a wide range of vital sectors that depend on the reliability and sustainability of operating and maintenance systems. We are a trusted partner for those looking for precise parts and durable spare parts.

heroProducts.title: Spare Parts Solutions You Need - With the Quality You Deserve
heroProducts.description: At A'amal Al-Qeta'a Trading Company, we offer a comprehensive range of original and high-quality spare parts for various industrial and commercial applications. We guarantee the quality and outstanding performance of all our products.

features.title: Certified Quality
features.description: All our products undergo rigorous quality checks and possess international specification certificates

features.title: Fast Delivery
features.description: Instant delivery service for all types of spare parts in various regions

heroProducts.cardDescription: We are committed to providing spare parts that meet the highest international quality standards, ensuring outstanding performance and longer lifespan.

specializedServices.title: Our Specialized Services
specializedServices.description: We offer a comprehensive range of specialized services that meet all our customers' needs in the field of truck spare parts and industrial equipment.

service1.title: After-Sales Service & Technical Assembly
service1.description: We believe that the relationship with the customer does not end after the sale. Therefore, we provide specialized technical support and technical guidance to ensure optimal use of parts and achieve the required performance.

service2.title: Local & International Delivery
service2.description: We provide fast and secure delivery services within the Kingdom and internationally, whether for individual customers or companies and institutions, through our logistics partners.

service3.title: Import on Demand
service3.description: We provide the possibility of importing parts that are not locally available according to customer requirements, in cooperation with a wide network of trusted global suppliers, while ensuring quality and timely delivery.

service4.title: Custom Curtain Sider Tarpaulin Tailoring
service4.description: We provide custom design and tailoring services for curtain sider tarpaulins with the highest quality, with the possibility of printing the customer's name or company logo on the tarp. A professional service that reflects your company's identity and enhances the appearance of your fleet on the road.

service5.title: Truck Inspection & Programming
service5.description: We provide precise electronic inspection and programming services for truck systems using advanced diagnostic devices covering sensor systems, ABS, engine, and others. This helps in early fault detection and improves the overall performance of the vehicle.

service6.title: Installation & Inspection of Petroleum Loading/Unloading Systems
service6.description: We provide installation, inspection, and maintenance services for petroleum tanker loading and unloading systems, including arms, valves, and connections. We work according to the highest industrial safety standards to ensure proper and secure operation in fuel facilities and distribution centers.

service7.title: Maintenance & Repair of Air Valves & Brake Chambers
service7.description: We provide professional maintenance and repair services for brake chambers and air valves used in trucks and trailers, using specialized tools and original parts. We ensure the system returns to its full performance with precise inspection and warranty on the work performed.

targetSectors.title: Sectors We Serve
targetSectors.subtitle: We meet the needs of multiple sectors with reliable and highly efficient solutions
targetSectors.description: We serve a wide range of vital sectors that depend on the reliability and sustainability of operating and maintenance systems. We are a trusted partner for those looking for precise parts and lasting spare parts.
